name: Catholic Social Services of Montana

description: Catholic Social Services of Montana offers mental health counseling, adoption services, and support for families in need. They have Catholic counselors available and provide services to all Montanans

description: The Billings Mediation Center offers facilitative mediation services for various disputes, focusing on helping parties reach mutually agreeable solutions

name: Mountain Law and Mediation, PC

name: Montana Mediation Association

name: Montana Legal Services Association (MLSA) - Family Transition Project

description: This project offers free family mediation services for low-income Montanans needing a parenting plan or divorce, including child support calculation and legal advice
